hadiths.text: Narrated AbdurRahman ibn Awf: I heard the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) say: Allah the Exalted has said: I am Compassionate, and this has been derived from mercy. I have derived its name from My name. If anyone joins it, I shall join him, and if anyone cuts it off, I shall cut him off

chapter.eng-name: On Doing Kindness To Near Relatives
